context: Analyze this seated twist pose and identify comprehensive transition relationships. Sage Pose (Bharadvajasana) Deep seated twist with legs to one side. Consider the Spinal rotation, hip asymmetry, shoulder mobility. Analyze transitions that flow naturally from this pose and evaluate both immediate possibilities and progressive developments. Factor in modifications for different ability levels and the pose's role in creating balanced sequences.

practitioner.position: Deep seated twist with legs to one side
practitioner.primaryFocus: Spinal rotation, hip asymmetry, shoulder mobility

specificNeeds: Spinal rotation, hip asymmetry, shoulder mobility
